DOC.brief_title: The Impact Psychological Well-being Outcome Surgical Repair Rotator Cuff Tears
DOC.detailed_description: This study take place multiple centre across University Toronto network . The primary outcome interest Western Ontario Rotator Cuff Index ( WORC ) measure one year follow surgery . The WORC disease specific , quality life measurement tool 21 question separate 5 domain : physical symptom , sports/recreation , work , lifestyle , emotion . Secondary outcomes interest Constant Murley Score ( CMS ) , rely subjective well objective component score , EQ-5D-5L use general measure health . Psychological well-being measure use Patient Health Questionnaire-8 ( PHQ-8 ) , 7-item General Anxiety Disorder scale ( GAD-7 ) , Patient Catastrophizing Scale ( PCS ) , expectation survey Musculoskeletal Outcomes Data Evaluation Management System [ MODEMS ] . Post-operative satisfaction measure use MODEMS satisfaction survey .
